page.title: 06Employment in Aboyne
page.content: About half of the people who live in Aboyne work outwith the area, many in businesses such as oil. Of those who do work in Aboyne, the majority work in the service sector. The main areas of{employment}in Aboyne are in the local community centre, where many cleaners, secretaries, attendants for the swimming pool and games hall are needed. Many jobs are also found in the shopping and hotel services. There are few jobs to be found in the agricultural sector. {Tourism}in the summer brings some employment, especially in the hotels, but this only lasts until the autumn. There is also the availability of{jobs}in the local hospital and health clinic. {Unemployment}in Aboyne is not a problem. Any unemployment is seasonal and lasts only for the winter.
